title: Add prominent Take Quiz CTA in landing page hero

requirements.summary: Add a large, prominent "Take Quiz" button in the landing page main content (hero/body) that uses the existing onNavigateToQuiz handler, without affecting the existing header button or view-switching flow.
acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page (PhysioTrackLanding), there is a clearly visible large "Take Quiz" button within the hero section or other main body content area (not just in the top-right header button group).
Clicking the new large "Take Quiz" button navigates to the quiz view using the existing navigation flow (App view switches to 'quiz').
The existing small header "Take Quiz" button remains functional.
The new large button uses existing UI components (shadcn Button) and is visually comparable in prominence to other primary CTAs (e.g., size="lg").
Layout remains responsive: the button is easily tappable and does not overlap other content on small screens.

file_operations.description: In the Hero Section CTA button row, add an additional large "Take Quiz" button that calls the existing onNavigateToQuiz prop (no new navigation flow). Use the existing shadcn-ui Button component to match other CTAs (e.g., size="lg") and apply responsive layout classes (e.g., keep within the existing flex-wrap group and ensure it remains comfortably tappable on small screens). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
